phase_log: Draw Phase: Chandra skips draw (First Player).
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (1).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Raging Goblin {R}. Resolves.
Combat Phase: Raging Goblin attacks. Jace takes 1 damage.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Island.
Main Phase: Jace plays Island (1).
Main Phase: Jace passes (Holding Owl Familiar for better mana efficiency next turn).
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Mountain.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (2).
Combat Phase: Raging Goblin attacks. Jace takes 1 damage.
Main Phase: Chandra casts Volcanic Hammer {1}{R} targeting Jace. Jace takes 3 damage.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Hand of Death.
Main Phase: Jace plays Swamp (1).
Main Phase: Jace casts Owl Familiar {1}{U}. Enters battlefield.
Trigger: Jace draws Gravedigger, discards Swamp.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Stone Rain.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (3).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Stone Rain {2}{R} targeting Jace's Swamp.
Action: Swamp is destroyed. Jace down to 1 land.
Combat Phase: Raging Goblin attacks. Jace blocks with Owl Familiar.
Damage: Trade. Both creatures die.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Island.
Main Phase: Jace plays Island (2).
Main Phase: Jace passes.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Blaze.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (4).
Main Phase: Chandra considers Fire Imp but has no targets. Holds it.
Main Phase: Chandra casts Stone Rain {2}{R} targeting Island.
Action: Island destroyed. Jace down to 1 land.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Swamp.
Main Phase: Jace plays Swamp (2).
Main Phase: Jace passes. (Stuck on mana for Man-o'-War/Mystic Denial interactions).
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Volcanic Dragon.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (5).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Fire Imp {2}{R}. Mandatory trigger targeting itself? No, Chandra chooses to cast Blaze {X}{R} (X=4) at Jace instead.
Damage: Jace takes 4 damage.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Ingenious Thief.
Main Phase: Jace plays Island (3).
Main Phase: Jace casts Ingenious Thief {1}{U}.
Trigger: Jace looks at Chandra's hand. Sees: [Fire Imp, Thundermare, Volcanic Dragon].
Strategy: Jace knows big threats are coming and needs to save Mystic Denial.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Mountain.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (6).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Fire Imp {2}{R}. Trigger targets Ingenious Thief.
Action: Ingenious Thief takes 2 damage and dies.
Combat Phase: No attacks.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Swamp.
Main Phase: Jace plays Swamp (4).
Main Phase: Jace casts Man-o'-War {2}{U}. Targets Fire Imp.
Action: Fire Imp returns to Chandra's hand.
Main Phase: Jace passes (1 mana open, holding Mystic Denial + Hand of Death).
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Forked Lightning.
Main Phase: Chandra casts Thundermare {5}{R}. (Must resolve this to push damage).
Response: Jace cannot counter (Mystic Denial costs {1}{U}{U}, Jace has {B} open).
Action: Thundermare resolves. Trigger taps Man-o'-War.
Combat Phase: Thundermare attacks. Jace takes 5 damage.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Island.
Main Phase: Jace plays Island (5).
Main Phase: Jace casts Hand of Death {2}{B} targeting Thundermare. Destroyed.
Main Phase: Jace casts Gravedigger {3}{B} (Tapped out). Returns Owl Familiar to hand.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Mountain.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (7).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Volcanic Dragon {4}{R}{R}. Haste.
Combat Phase: Volcanic Dragon attacks.
Block: Jace cannot block (no flyers).
Damage: Jace takes 4 damage.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Ebon Dragon.
Main Phase: Jace plays Island (6).
Main Phase: Jace casts Cloud Dragon {5}{U}.
Note: Cloud Dragon (5/4) can block only creatures with flying. It is a perfect answer to Volcanic Dragon.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Mountain.
Main Phase: Chandra plays Mountain (8).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Fire Imp {2}{R}. Targets Man-o'-War. Man-o'-War dies.
Combat Phase: Volcanic Dragon (4/4) attacks.
Block: Cloud Dragon (5/4) blocks Volcanic Dragon.
Damage: Volcanic Dragon deals 4 to Cloud. Cloud deals 5 to Volcanic. Volcanic Dragon dies. Cloud Dragon survives with 4 damage marked.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Symbol of Unsummoning.
Main Phase: Jace casts Symbol of Unsummoning {2}{U} on Fire Imp. Draws a card (Swamp).
Combat Phase: Cloud Dragon and Gravedigger attack.
Damage: Chandra takes 5 + 2 = 7 damage.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Lava Axe.
Main Phase: Chandra casts Lava Axe {4}{R} targeting Jace.
Response: Jace casts Mystic Denial {1}{U}{U}. Lava Axe is countered.
Note: Jace saved the counterspell for the lethal burn.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Hand of Death.
Combat Phase: Cloud Dragon and Gravedigger attack.
Damage: Chandra takes 7 damage.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Stone Rain (Useless).
Main Phase: Chandra casts Forked Lightning {3}{R} targeting Cloud Dragon (4 dmg).
Damage: Cloud Dragon takes 4 damage and dies.
Main Phase: Chandra recasts Fire Imp {2}{R}. Targets Gravedigger (2 dmg). Gravedigger dies.

state_snapshot.board_state: Chandra has board, Jace has open board but hand advantage.

phase_log: Draw Phase: Jace draws Ebon Dragon.
Main Phase: Jace casts Ebon Dragon {5}{B}{B} (Flying, 5/4).
Trigger: Chandra discards Stone Rain.
Combat Phase: No attacks (Summoning Sickness).
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Mountain.
Main Phase: Passes. Fire Imp cannot attack into Ebon Dragon.
Draw Phase: Jace draws Island.
Combat Phase: Ebon Dragon attacks.
Damage: Chandra takes 5 damage.
Draw Phase: Chandra draws Raging Goblin.
Main Phase: Chandra casts Raging Goblin {R}. Attacks.
Block: Ebon Dragon blocks Goblin. Goblin dies.
Note: Desperation attack hoping for a misclick/no block.
Combat Phase: Ebon Dragon attacks.
Damage: Chandra takes 5 damage.
